Class BitmapGraphic

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.RasterGraphic
us.mn.state.dot.tms.BitmapGraphic
public class BitmapGraphic extends RasterGraphic
BitmapGraphic is a simple 1-bit graphic bitmap for DMS display feedback.
Author:
Douglas Lau
